name: Digital Paintball 2
description: Sets up the native version of the game
notes: You probably want to use the wine version because the Linux port uses oss for sound and I have no idea how to make it work on a modern Linux system.
content:
files:
- gamefiles: http://downloads.sourceforge.net/paintball2/paintball2_build041_linux_full.tar.gz
game:
  exe: paintball2
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/
    file: gamefiles
